phrs.translation: 整容天后, 杀人王曼森, 改编自冈崎京子的漫画

sentences.sentence: He now faces another crisis in his helter-skelter existence.
sentences.translation: 他乱糟糟的生活中又出现了另一个危机。

sentences.sentence: There are more calls to get to higher ground, and people are running helter skelter.
sentences.translation: 仍有人在叫其他人到地势较高的地方去，人们 惊慌失措地跑着。

sentences.sentence: Helter Skelter is really "close to the metal", yet its power has stood the test of time.
sentences.translation: 《慌慌张张》十分“接近金属”，但其实力经受了时间的考验。
